name: Mad Monkey Manor
description:
You start off as an adventurer in hopes of finding the rumored treasures of Mad Monkey Manor, but those who enter have never returned.

With only bananas and dodge rolling within your arsenal, how long can you survive the horrors that await you as you explore the manor?

Controls

  • Movement - Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Space - Roll
  • F - Throw Banana
  • R - Eat Banana
  • Shift - Run
  • Enter - Confirm/Interact
  • F5 - Full Screen
  • F12 - Restart Game

Credits

  • Artwork: Jackie, https://twitter.com/RoseyPixels
  • Background Art and Assets: Shan/Rowlna, https://twitter.com/spacecircus_
  • Musician/Sound Design: ExitiumLux, https://yoriyakuza.newgrounds.com/
  • Monkey Sounds: Sean, https://twitter.com/bastardva
  • Map Design: Dae'udain, https://ldjam.com/users/dae-udain/
  • Programming: ToMo, https://itch.io/profile/not-tomo
